content.description: Some membrane proteins help maintain the concentrations of ions inside a cell by transporting the ions across the cell’s plasma membrane. Other membrane proteins form pores in the plasma membrane through which the ions can diffuse. A model showing the influence of membrane proteins on the movement of sodium (<math alttext="N a plus" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>Na</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext></mtext><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>) and potassium (<math alttext="K plus" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>K</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext></mtext><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>) ions across a plasma membrane is presented in Figure 1.
content.question: Figure 1. Section of a cell’s plasma membrane, showing ion concentrations and membrane proteins Based on the model presented in Figure 1, which of the following changes will most likely result from a depletion of available <math alttext="A T P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> stores inside the cell?

choices.label: The <math alttext="N a plus" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>Na</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration outside the cell will increase.
The <math alttext="N a plus" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>Na</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>concentration inside the cell will increase.
The <math alttext="K plus" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>K</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration inside the cell will increase.
The <math alttext="K plus" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>K</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration outside the cell will decrease.

content.answer: The <math alttext="N a plus" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>Na</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>concentration inside the cell will increase.

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
